1.1.name: wordpress/flipping-team
1.1.description:
Nowadays, wordpress is more than just a blog. And behind such website is a team. The plugin acknowledges those guys.

The plugin provides the administrator with a nice interface to add/edit/delete the team members, the team will appear in pages or posts, where you put the shortcode.

  • Nice user interface
  • Cool Jquery effects
  • Easy to configure and install

Available in English, Hindi and French.
